shortContent: A metal object weighing 2 kilogram per the character's WP bonus within 40m flies to the character's hand when spending a Full Action and a successful WP bonus
content:
The character can call an unsecured metal object to his hand as
with Ferric Lure. The character may summon objects of up to
2 kilograms per point of Willpower Bonus, and the object may
be up to 40 metres distant. The character must spend a Full
Action and succeed on a Willpower Test to enact this rite.
extraSubCategories:
Techmarine or Mechanicus Implants,
Ferric Lure
